title: 'Suits' Spinoff Starring Gina Torres in the Works at USA Network
text:
5:53pm PT by Kate Stanhope 'Suits' Spinoff Starring Gina Torres in the Works at USA Network Shane Mahood/USA Network Gina Torres and Gabriel Macht on USA's 'Suits' Torres would reprise her role as Jessica Pearson, which she played for six seasons on the legal drama. 
Suits is looking to bring Gina Torres back into the fold — but there's a twist. 
A spinoff series centered on Torres' character, Jessica Pearson, is in the works at Universal Cable Productions, The Hollywood Reporter has confirmed. 
Sources caution it is extremely early in the development process and USA has not yet been pitched the potential offshoot. No deals are currently in place. 
The untitled project comes after Torres' exit from Suits midway through season six. Her departure from the series was amicable, as the actress made her desire to return to her home base in Los Angeles ( Suits shoots in Toronto) known to producers. 
"Toward the beginning of season five, Gina expressed that, due to personal stuff going on in her life, she needed to be in L.A. more. We formulated a plan at that point to try and gracefully exit her from the show," series creator Aaron Korsh told THR in September. "She said at the time that if Suits were shot in L.A. she’d be on it forever, and if I had my way, she’d be on it forever." 
Pearson was written out in the midseason finale of season six when she left the firm, and New York, to start anew in Chicago. 
It did not take long for Torres to line up a new gig, having joined ABC's The Catch for its upcoming sophomore season. The veteran actress has also been fielding broadcast pilot offers. 
Now in its sixth season, Suits currently ranks as USA's longest-running show. The legal drama has already been renewed for season seven. 
USA Network and UCP declined comment. Kate Stanhope
